item_description: A greasy, synth-meat patty fried in engine oil, served with a side of swagger at the Greasy Bolt Diner. Boosts pirate crew spirits.
A jury-rigged air purifier part scavenged from storm-wrecked ships, essential for platform survival.
A blood-sealed chit from Jessa 'One-Eye' Korran, granting a new pirate a spot on Bucephalus’s lawless crew.
A glitchy sensor tuned to find the lost iridium vein, though the Company bans its use.
A bitter brew from the Rusty Pick saloon, dulling the pain of endless mining shifts.
A desperate agreement to join the mine’s workforce, promising grueling hours but steady rations.
A cutting-edge device for mapping spacetime anomalies, vital for Dr. Voss’s FTL experiments.
A brain-teasing hologram game mimicking graviton patterns, a favorite among Atlas researchers.
A rare slot to join the station’s science team, analyzing asteroid-deflected data.
A sturdy tool for collecting nutrient-rich algae, sustaining the colony’s food supply.
A carved whalebone token blessed by fishermen, said to carry Balenus’s storm-calming strength.
A mentorship under a seasoned angler, learning to navigate Ezekiel’s sacred seas.
Cheap, volatile fuel refined from ring wrecks, powering Skimmer Clan skiffs.
A set of needles and glowing ink for etching clan sigils, bonding Mu 6’s scavengers.
A handwritten pass to join the Skimmer Clan, hunting treasures in Mu 6’s debris rings.
A polished badge honoring the Stellar Schism, worn proudly by rebel veterans.
A crate of smuggled ammo and parts, fueling the Confederation’s fight for freedom.
A call to arms for the Confederation, swearing loyalty to their untaxed cause.
A stolen schematic for building rebel frigates, guarded fiercely by Technon’s workers.
A red cloth band sewn during the rebellion, symbolizing Technon 9’s defiance.
A pact to labor in Technon’s smoggy forges, crafting ships for the Confederation.
A tightly controlled dose of combat stims, keeping Militarum soldiers alert.
A tattered flag from the mutiny, rallying troops with tales of the Night of the Long Watch.
A steel pin marking induction into the Militarum’s ranks, sworn to defend the Confederation.
A blade resistant to the jungle’s electric hum, cutting through vines and beasts alike.
A worn book of forager stories, easing fears of Orion’s feverish wilderness.
A seasoned tracker to lead crews through the jungle’s electromagnetic maze.
A polished dune crystal that focuses starlight, revealing hidden patterns in the sands.
A small crystal shard refracting hypnotic beams, calming minds under J76G423-b’s spell.
A blank journal for mapping the unclaimed world, luring bold souls to its mysteries.
A hacked pass to access Cerberus’s genetic archives, traded in secret markets.
A gilded ticket to a lavish Company party, a rare escape from quota-driven life.
A permit to manage Cerberus’s bustling docks, overseeing wealth and exploitation.
